sources.title: The World Gone Mad
sources.description: Title: The World Gone Mad Summary: A district attorney and a reporter try to find the killer of a D.A. who uncovered a massive stock fraud. Directed by: Christy Cabanne Actors: Production Company: Larry Darmour Productions Release Date: 15 April 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A district attorney and a reporter try to find the killer of a D.A. who uncovered a massive stock fraud.

sources.title: The World Gone Mad
sources.description: After the death of the D.A. under dubious circumstances, hard living, well-connected reporter Andy Terrell investigates. What he discovers soon has him fearful that his friend, the new D.A. investigating the same leads as his predecessor, will meet the same end. It's up to Terrell to piece it all together before it's too late. Starring: Pat O'Brien, Evelyn Brent, Neil Hamilton, Mary Brian, Louis Calhearn, and J. Carrol Naish IMDb Page The 716MB MPEG4 file was derived from the 1.9GB MPEG2 found on this page to provide a smaller, quality copy for downloading.

sources.title: The World Gone Mad
sources.description: The World Gone Mad is a 1933 drama/horror film which pits the district attorney's office against crooks defrauding a corporation from within, unbeknownst to the company's owner. This film is in the public domain.

sources.title: The World Gone Mad (1933)

sources.title: The World Gone Mad (1933) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: Pat O'Brien, Evelyn Brent and Neil Hamilton
Director: Christy Cabanne

A district attorney and a reporter try to find the killer of a D.A. who uncovered a massive stock fraud.

metadata.Plot: A district attorney is investigating a utility company's directors for fraud. He gets a call about some incriminating evidence, but it's a ploy to lure him to an apartment where he is gunned down. To make the shooting seem less like an effort to suppress the investigation, it's made it look like the district attorney was keeping a jealous mistress. Andy Terrell, his wisecracking newspaperman friend, is networked with practically everyone and gets curious. Things get complicated for the utility company directors because Lionel Houston, now the new district attorney, is dating Diane Cromwell, the daughter of utility director Grover Cromwell. Andy uses his connections in low places to ferret out information but runs afoul of the king-pin Bruno by dallying with his lady. The utility directors were using their purloined funds to gamble in other stocks. Suddenly, they have no funds left plus cooked books. One tells Grover that he knows how to get his hands on $1M in gold bullion. He thinks he has talked Grover into fleeing with him, but Grover decides to arrange for a train/car accident so that his insurance will provide for his daughter. Lionel is lured by Bruno to a meeting but brings reinforcements.
metadata.Actors: Pat O'Brien, Evelyn Brent, Neil Hamilton
